ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion
=====================================

.. py:module:: ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Methods to convert to and from waveform protobuf messages.



Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_analog_waveform_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_analog_waveform_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_complex_waveform_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_complex_waveform_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.int16_complex_waveform_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.int16_complex_waveform_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_spectrum_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.float64_spectrum_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.int16_analog_waveform_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.int16_analog_waveform_from_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.digital_waveform_to_protobuf
   ni.protobuf.types.waveform_conversion.digital_waveform_from_protobuf


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:function:: float64_analog_waveform_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python AnalogWaveform to a protobuf DoubleAnalogWaveform.


.. py:function:: float64_analog_waveform_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf DoubleAnalogWaveform to a Python AnalogWaveform.


.. py:function:: float64_complex_waveform_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python ComplexWaveform to a protobuf DoubleComplexWaveform.


.. py:function:: float64_complex_waveform_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf DoubleComplexWaveform to a Python ComplexWaveform.


.. py:function:: int16_complex_waveform_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python ComplexWaveform to a protobuf DoubleComplexWaveform.


.. py:function:: int16_complex_waveform_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf DoubleComplexWaveform to a Python ComplexWaveform.


.. py:function:: float64_spectrum_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python Spectrum to a protobuf DoubleSpectrum.


.. py:function:: float64_spectrum_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf DoubleSpectrum to a Python Spectrum.


.. py:function:: int16_analog_waveform_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python AnalogWaveform to a protobuf I16AnalogWaveform.


.. py:function:: int16_analog_waveform_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf I16AnalogWaveform to a Python AnalogWaveform.


.. py:function:: digital_waveform_to_protobuf(value, /)

   Convert the Python DigitalWaveform to a protobuf DigitalWaveform.


.. py:function:: digital_waveform_from_protobuf(message, /)

   Convert the protobuf DigitalWaveform to a Python DigitalWaveform.
